name: Dang Space Adventure
description: From Dang: (click on the screen to start, sorry for the long loading time, it is recommended to play in full screen to see all of the Hud and you might want to turn down the volume) Press ASDW to move. Hold left click to do standard firing. Press T to turbo, press B to do special shoot and press M to do multi shoot. Main objective is to kill the boss to win the game. Enjoy. PS: all the player bullet curves to make it unpredictable.
